website_summaries.verdict: The vintage looks of the Puma Whirlwind Classic remains to be its major catch. However, aside from promising good looks, the shoe offers the same advantages it did in the early 1980s when it was released as a running shoe.This is probably the reason why several generations of sneaker fans continue buying these shoes not only for its nostalgic appeal but also for its consistent delivery of a comfortable midsole cushioning, a snug fit and a durable outsole to last for years.
pros: Many users like the Puma Whirlwind Classic because of its classic looks and retro feels
Majority of buyers agree that the shoes are budget friendly at $60 price tag
Most comments point out how ‘comfortable’ the shoes felt on feet
Several customers are impressed by its snug fit that needs a little break-in for a perfect fit
Quite a lot of wearers applaud the soft and comfortable midsole cushioning
Some users are surprised that the trainers are still performing well during workouts in the gym despite it being a classic lifestyle sneaker
A good number of consumers love the vibrant colors of the shoe that blends well with various clothes
Numerous reviewers find the Whirlwind Classic from Puma as a good quality walking shoe ideal for everyday use
The shoes used lightweight yet durable materials, some critics have observed
The rubber outsole has a good and solid grip, according to some commenters
cons: A few reviewers notice that the minimal arch support of Puma Whirlwind Classic could be difficult for extended wear
One observer notes that suede material used in the upper is difficult to clean
A few users cite that this shoe runs a bit narrow

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Pair and Counting
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of the Whirlwind shoe and the sizing has always been consistent. At the time of this review, I am currently on my 5th pair. Overall it is a nice looking shoe and relatively comfortable. There is minimal arc support, which at times causes issues for me after an extended period of time, but overall they are nice to wear so long as they are still in good condition. These shoes have had a lifespan of about 4 months of everyday wear. After 4 months the heel started to flatten out and the sole's cushion started to give way.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolaos E Vitoroulis Jr

customer_reviews.title: I love them, but they are too narrow
customer_reviews.text: This would have been my first pair of Pumas unfortunately I had to return them. The length was correct but the shoes are too narrow. I love the style of the shoes and really wanted to keep them. They may have stretched over time, however it can be difficult to judge and I didn't want to spend money on a pair of shoes that I could not wear and enjoy. Reluctantly I decided to return them. I really wish these came in a wider size.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Sweet shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome. I have a wide foot, so these are a bit narrow for my liking, but I expected that after reading reviews. I wear them as casual & they are just fine, but thinking about getting another pair for golf. I'll buy again
customer_reviews.author: WooPig

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent, light weight
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent, light weight, flexible running shoes that fit right out of the box. I was expecting a break-in period, but these sneakers were both supportive and comfortable right away. The sole is a little thinner than some other sneakers, and the shoe is probably not best for heavy extension on nasty surfaces, but as an everyday shoe, it's wonderful. What's more, the upper is not gaudy, not a teenager's attempt to grab attention, so these are nice shoes to wear while working in an office or while teaching.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mosley

customer_reviews.title: one thing you might want to know
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my son. Son and husband both informed me that the nubs on the soles are considered to be an indoor cleat and that some schools won't allow them to be worn indoors because they of the wear and tear on carpets (!). Nothing in the description mentioned anything about this! When I offered to return them, though, son balked and said he could wear them for summer camp. Ok then. He likes the colors, I guess. Oh and they are a tad narrow.

He is wanting to order these for all of his employees now.

customer_reviews.title: Puma Classic Sneakers

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes

Finally, the color is pretty darned close to the pictures - REALLY bright blue and very white. The Puma swoop is a leathery type material, so it's a bit washable, but the rest of the white areas will most likely be an issue to keep clean.

Only caveat would be there's not a lot of arch support for those with high arches. I have flat feet so they fit me fine. Would love to see these shoes come in even more colors.

customer_reviews.text: It's not every day that you have a complete stranger come up and ask to take a pic of your shoes—well it IS every day when you wear the Puma Whirlwind. That happened when I was chillin outside of a Jimmy Kimmel Live taping. So, basically, these shoes are celebrities and they make you feel like a celebrity yourself. Who knows? They may have been responsible for getting me into the VIP lounge at JKL. They're comfortable for sure and seem like good quality. The only complaint I have is that they don't breathe and may make your feet overheat when you're out looking awesome.

product_meta.title: PUMA Mens Whirlwin Whirlwind Classic
product_meta.description: This classic runner was an instant hit when first introduced in the 80's with distinct features such as the aggressive lug outsole pattern and classic nylon/suede upper. Keeping this original with repeating PUMA sock logo and classic black/green PUMA #1 logo on the tongue. Coming up with fresh colorways for this spring/summer season.
feature_bullets: Nylon upper with suede overlays and synthetic PUMA Formstrip
Lace closure for a snug fit
Grippy rubber outsole with lug pattern for added stability and grip
